title: Department of Out-of-Furnace Treatment of Cast Iron

items: Research of heat and mass transfer processes in the "liquid cast iron - reagent - slag - gas phase" system during out-of-furnace treatment of cast iron in ladles.
Development of new processes and technological solutions for out-of-furnace preparation of cast iron for steelmaking.
Development and creation of new technological and apparatus components of out-of-furnace cast iron refining complexes.
Analysis of technological solutions for out-of-furnace cast iron treatment used in world practice and forecasts of promising directions.

Development and pilot testing of technological recommendations for optimizing cast iron preparation technology (desulfurization, adjustment of ladle slag parameters) in the production of low-sulfur converter steel.
Mastering and implementation of developments for out-of-furnace cast iron treatment on modernized and reconstructed complexes of metallurgical plants.
